content.description: reading code and find bug (2016 Fall, Midterm 2, Question 8 part b)

p.line: Consider the problem of wanting to determine if the numbers of a list (of at least two items) are all increasing (i.e., every element after the first one is larger than the one before). Note: the input will always have at least 2 items. Here's some of the example calls:
What's wrong (if anything) with the following attempt?
It only returns the test of the _EMPHS_first_EMPHE_ two elements.
It only returns the test of the _EMPHS_last_EMPHE_ two elements.
It only returns whether the first element is smallest.
Some other logical problem not described here.

content.hint: calculates the minimum value, and only reports whether the first element is equal to the minimum number
